bug.author: bsekachev
bug.summary: Bug: Value must be a user instance
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
No exceptions <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Uncaught Error: Value must be a user instance at Task.set (session.js:1007) at onSelect (details.tsx:206) at Object.handleSelect [as onSelect] (user-selector.tsx:79) at Select._this.fireSelect (Select.js:951) at Object.Select._this.onMenuSelect [as onClick] (Select.js:281) at Object.Menu._this.onClick (Menu.js:73) at SubPopupMenu._this.onClick (SubPopupMenu.js:170) at onClick (SubPopupMenu.js:263) at MenuItem._this.onClick (MenuItem.js:100) at HTMLUnknownElement.callCallback (react-dom.development.js:188) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Go to a task page Assignee a user for the task Focus assignee field and try to assignee the same user for the task again
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
N/A <denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Git hash commit (git log -1): a9b2817 Docker version docker version (e.g. Docker 17.0.05): n/a Are you using Docker Swarm or Kubernetes? n/a Operating System and version (e.g. Linux, Windows, MacOS): ubuntu 18.04
<denchmark-h:h3>Next steps</denchmark-h>
You may <denchmark-link:https://gitter.im/opencv-cvat/public>join our Gitter</denchmark-link> channel for community support.
